item.description:
We are accepting reservations up until 11 pm Friday night. After that you can still get tickets by clicking here... http://shop.drinkwaterproductions.com/category.sc;jsessionid=C3F9A6FACFD2A24194202CA088CA0DDD.qscstrfrnt02?categoryId=28

Get all your female friends and family together and bring them! (All are welcome single, married, divorced, etc.) They do not have to be a member of the meetup group to attend.

Enjoy a fun night out with the amazing Jon Stetson!

His charismatic and lively demonstrations provide a rare opportunity to experience the fascinating phenomenon of an intuitive experience.

Internationally known m

entalist Jon Stetson delivers a unique brand of psychic entertainment with his distinctive style of humor, intensity, and compassion. Audience members will live, love, laugh, and learn!

Come for the dinner and show or just the show.

Sorry guys - ladies only for this one, but we hope to see you at another event soon.

Over the past 25 years, President Bush, President Carter, the King of Sweden, the Royal Family of Monaco, Donald Trump, Bob Kraft and the New England Patriots, Fortune 1000 organizations, professional associations, and celebrity audiences have experienced Jon Stetson worldwide. During this time Jon has also made television appearances on CBS, CNN, NBC, PBS, and the A&E Network.

Dinner - doors open 7 pm
$59 by 1/9/13, $64 after 1/9/13
Join us for dinner and engage in fun socializing and great conversations prior to the show.

  • Tossed Salad
  • Rolls
  • Chef's Choice of Vegetable
  • Chef's Choice of Potato
  • 6oz Boneless Breast of Chicken (marsala or picatta)
  • Chef's Choice of Dessert
  • Coffee & Tea

Show Only - doors open at 8 pm
$35 by 1/9/13, $40 after 1/9/13
Change the amount in payment box when you RSVP.

If you are signed up for the show only, please do not arrive before 8 pm.

When you check-in at the registration desk, tell them you are with Jacki's Meetup and they will direct you to our tables.

Showtime at 8:30 pm

Check out comments from our show in August...

It was high paced and kept us entertained. Worth the price.

The show was great, had a lot of laughs.

Great time! He was amazing.

Jon Stetson is amazing. I don't know how he does it!!

What a great time - a night full of laughs and amazement!

 

More about this event...

The “Ladies Only Psychic Party” is a brand new, fun-filled evening, where we will Live, Love, Laugh, and Learn! You will be enthralled by new demonstrations of Jon’s unique brand of psychic entertainment. However, that is just the beginning!

You will be empowered to understand and further develop your own psychic skills. Participants will, indeed, amaze themselves and discover their unlimited potential.

Jon will introduce you to “The Jewel,” awakening your intuition. It is his own secret to happiness and the key to unlimited energy!

The evening will conclude with a seldom-seen demonstration of a “Crystal Gazing” Gallery reading!

Join us for an unforgettable evening of psychic fun. Together we will create Magnificent

Memories that will last a lifetime.
item.name: Ladies Only Psychic Party with Famous Mentalist, Jon Stetson
